summary: Provides a transformer‑based decoder that transforms joint image‑text embeddings into natural language token sequences, using a configurable GPT‑2‑style architecture to generate token probabilities for downstream text generation tasks.
business_intent: Facilitates multimodal generation by enabling text output conditioned on visual inputs, supporting applications such as image captioning, visual storytelling, and other AI systems that require coherent language generation from combined image‑text representations.
